message: Via you are the 1st Marine that has written something so foolish because """"if"""" you are SSGT in my beloved Corps, you seriously need to drop out as a recruiter and go do another MOS because you are totally unqualified for your post. You hear, and read these stories about illness, death, and lack of healthcare for our citizens, and you become overwhelmed with heartache. I can't for the life of me understand how people in power can hear these same type of stories daily, and continue to fight against healthcare for all. I can't even imagine the level of frustration that Senator Sanders goes through.

No matter how you plan to vote, this should bother you immensely. That the Russians would SO want Trump president, that they'd pull a stunt like this. If they can get into the DNC, they can certainly get into the RNC and if you think there weren't incriminating emails over there, well, I've got some ocean front property in AZ you may be interested in. A foreign country should have no part in deciding an American election.
